mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_PRODUCT A WHERE A.CORP_NO = #{corpNo}

SELECT E.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , D.* FROM (SELECT A.PROD_NO , A.PROD_NAME , A.PROD_PRICE , A.PROD_DETAILS , A.PROD_UPLOAD_DATE , A.PROD_TERMINATE_DATE , A.PROD_DISCOUNT_RATE , A.PROD_DISCOUNT_PERIOD , A.PROD_MANUFACTURER , A.STOCK_QUANTITY , A.PROD_DISPLAY_CHK , B.PROD_CTG_NO , B.PROD_CTG_NAME , A.CORP_NO , A.PROD_HITS FROM TBL_PRODUCT A JOIN TBL_PROD_CATEGORY B ON (A.PROD_CTG_NO = B.PROD_CTG_NO) WHERE A.CORP_NO = #{CorpUserSession.corpNo} ORDER BY A.PROD_NO DESC) D ) E WHERE E.RNUM BETWEEN #{pageInfo.startRow} AND #{pageInfo.endRow}

mapper.select: SELECT A.PROD_NO , A.PROD_NAME , A.PROD_PRICE , A.PROD_DETAILS , A.PROD_UPLOAD_DATE , A.PROD_TERMINATE_DATE , A.PROD_DISCOUNT_RATE , A.PROD_DISCOUNT_PERIOD , A.PROD_PRICE * (1 - A.PROD_DISCOUNT_RATE/100) AS PROD_DISCOUNTED_PRICE , A.PROD_MANUFACTURER , A.STOCK_QUANTITY , A.PROD_DISPLAY_CHK , B.PROD_CTG_NO , B.PROD_CTG_NAME , A.CORP_NO , A.PROD_HITS , C.PROD_IMG_NO , C.PROD_IMG_RENAME FROM TBL_PRODUCT A JOIN TBL_PROD_CATEGORY B ON (A.PROD_CTG_NO = B.PROD_CTG_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_PROD_IMG C ON (A.PROD_NO = C.PROD_NO) WHERE A.PROD_NO = #{prodNo} AND A.CORP_NO = #{corpNo}
